title: WTB T206 Titus raw or graded all backs, will pay very handsomely for the moooustache
author: broadhurstinc

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Titus raw or graded all backs, will pay very handsomely for the moooustache
posts.post_content:
Awhile back I took a likeing to the moooustache and what started as a back run has now evolded into a Titus reunion.

beaters to highest grades welcome and especially uncommon reverses. 

I will pay a minimum of $100 for any original White Border Titus card despite condition

please email scans and prices to [url]kris@broadhurstindustries.com[/url]
all sales will be held in confidence.

Thanks in advance,
Kris

Hi Kirk, noticed this new listing on eBay tonight (not mine):
[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/1910-T206-JOHN-TITUS-BASEBALL-CARD-PSA-2-MC-NICE-/320737839984?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item4aad770b70#ht_500wt_1413[/url]

One of my favorite cards in the set though! Good luck with the back run.

Here's my prized Old Mill:
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/traeregan/commons/1029/titus-john[/IMG]

Hey Trae,
yep saw that one in my search list, thanks for the heads up tho. 
like that he was the last to hang on to the old school look.. wish he didn't give in but he probably got his balls busted relentlessly by his teamates and fans till he did.. 
thats a sweet old mill u have there, if u ever want to part with it be sure to let me know.
Thanks,
Kris
Cheers, Kris - I'll drop you a line if I see any others (not on eBay) come up! :)
